snippet: Manny Machado, in his second major league appearance, became the youngest Baltimore Oriole to hit two homers in a game.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Baltimore Orioles defeat the Kansas City Royals, 7-1; other results noted.
lead_paragraph: Manny Machado, in his second major league appearance, became the youngest Baltimore Oriole to hit two homers in a game.

headline.seo: Orioles’ Machado Homers Twice in His Second Game
headline.main: Orioles Rookie Homers Twice for a Record
headline.print_headline: Orioles Rookie Homers Twice For a Record
